title: Oldster Fashion Takeover, The Oscars Gonna Be WEIRD 4.22.21
itunes:title: Oldster Fashion Takeover, The Oscars Gonna Be WEIRD 4.22.21
description:
In episode 893, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Roy's Job Fair host Roy Wood Jr. to discuss reactions to the Derek Chauvin verdict, states criminalizing protest, Quibi's possible return, Natty Light's new ice pop, senior citizen style, the Oscar's 'contagion' theme, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. How Minneapolis police initially described George Floyd's murder
  2. G.O.P. Anti-Protester Bills Include Immunity for Hitting Them With Cars
  3. Quibi’s library will live on through the Roku Channel
  4. Natty Light Now Comes as an 8% ABV Ice Pop
  5. Grandpa Style: Why 20-Somethings Are Dressing Like Senior Citizens
  6. Gramparents Instagram
  7. Oscars: Academy To Create European Hub(s) For Nominees Unable To Travel To U.S.; Producers Reveal New Details On Show
  8. Producers of COVID-Era Oscars: "It's Not Going to Be Like Anything That's Been Done Before"
  9. Oscar Show Takes Shape With Letter To Nominees: No Zooms, No Casual Dress, Covid Protocols In Force & “Stories Matter”
  10. The Oscars Are a Week Away, but How Many Will Watch?
  11. Oscar Producers Facing Backlash And Logistical Headaches After Requiring Nominees To Attend Ceremony In Person, Not On Zoom
  12. Oscars: Academy To Create European Hub(s) For Nominees Unable To Travel To U.S.; Producers Reveal New Details On Show
  13. Banning Zoom at the Oscars Didn’t Work Out: Producers Accommodate Overseas Nominees
  14. Oscar Attendees Will Not Wear Face Masks During Telecast (EXCLUSIVE)
  15. Oscar nominees, guests will qualify as essential workers to attend Academy Awards
  16. LISTEN: MED x Blu x Madlib - The Strip (feat Anderson .Paak)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
